name: Api\Response\Section
description: See the fields returned by the section endpoints.

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: The date and time this section was created.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identifier of the specified section.

properties.name: isDefault
properties.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether this is the default section for the channel.

properties.name: modifiedAt
properties.description: The date and time this section was last modified.

properties.name: shareUrl
properties.description: The URL of the channel in which this section appears.
